LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshRestore.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshMaxEnergy.label: muscular endurance
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 400 per level. Starting max energy is 800.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshEnergyEfficiency.label: muscular efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshEnergyEfficiency.descripti: Increases energy efficiency by 10% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshEnergyRate.label: energy synthesis
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 100 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_LeftArmBrace.label: left arm brace
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_LeftArmBrace.description: Increases block chance by 20%, stacks with right bracer.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_LeftArmCleaver.label: left arm (harvest) cleaver
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_LeftArmCleaver.descriptio:
Harvest plants
AoE Cleave Rage Cost: 15 Damage: 15 Splash: 2c
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_RightArmBrace.label: right arm brace
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_RightArmBrace.description: Increases block chance by 20%, stacks with left bracer.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_RightArmCleaver.label: right arm (chop) cleaver
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_RightArmCleaver.descripti:
Cut trees
AoE Cleave Rage Cost: 15 Damage: 15 Splash: 2c
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_Tusks.label: tusks
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_Horns.label: horns
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_Horns.description:
Adds a piercing attack and charge ability.
Bull Charge Rage Cost: 5 Cooldown: 10s
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_EyesT1.label: quad sight
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_EyesT2.label: evil eye
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_EyesT2.description:
Enables an ability that terrifies and slows enemies.
Evil Eye Rage Cost: 10 Cooldown: 2.2s Range: 40
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_Wings.label: wings
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_Wings.description:
Adds an ability that can grant the golem haste.
Haste Rage Cost: 15 Cooldown: 6s Double attack and move speed
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_SkullPlate.label: skull plate
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_ShoulderPlates.label: shoulder plates
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_ChestCage.label: chest cage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_SpineGuard.label: spine guard
LanguageData.TM_Golem_Flesh_LegPlates.label: leg plates
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshLifeStage.label: automaton power
LanguageData.TM_Golem_FleshLifeStage.description:
Increases stats and adds the dismember ability. Movement: +[20%/35%/50%] Health: +[30%/50%/70%]
Dismember Rage Cost: 25 Cooldown: 13s Range: 1c
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowRestore.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowMaxEnergy.label: mana cell
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 500 per level. Starting max energy is 2500.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowEnergyEfficiency.label: mana converter
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowEnergyEfficiency.descript: Increases energy efficiency by 10% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowEnergyRate.label: mana attractor
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 30 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAxe.label: hollow axe
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAxe.description: Adds a massive battle-axe that shears through multiple opponents with each swing. The hollowed axe occupies the weapon slot; only one weapon may be equipped.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowStaff.label: Hollow Staff
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowStaff.description: Enables a ranged, magical attack. The hollowed staff occupies the weapon slot; only one weapon may be equipped.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowBreastPlate.label: breastplate
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowBreastPlate.description: Increases armor for the chest and torso: Blunt: +21% Sharp: +32% Heat: +14%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowHelm.label: helmet
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowHelm.description: Protects the head and skull: Blunt: +22% Sharp: +7% Heat: +9%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowShoulders.label: shoulder guards
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowShoulders.description: Protects the shoulders, collar and neck: Blunt: +8% Sharp: +19% Heat: +6%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowCrown.label: Crown of Awakening
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowCrown.description:
Passively strengthens the will of the wearer to protect against magical attacks and offers minor physical protection. Active ability detects and nullify the magic of other spells.
Spell Reflection Energy Cost: 50 Cooldown: 6.6s Range: 100c Damage and radius varies based on mana cost of reflected spell
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowCloak.label: Fade Cloak
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowCloak.description:
The fade cloak passively increases the basic movement speed of the wearer while providing a small amount of protection. It also allows the wearer to instantly move to another location on the map by expending energy. If the wearer fades to a location near enemies, a decay blast will strike each enemy near the destination.
Blunt: +10% Sharp: +5% Heat: +15% Harmony: +5% Move Speed +.4c/s
Faded Decay Energy Cost: 30 Cooldown: 20s Min Range: 10c Max Range: 200c Decay Radius: 4c Hit Chance: 80%
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAFire.label: Coat of Arms: Fire
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAFire.description:
Passively increases stats and improves decay touch to deal bonus 10 + 5*level burn damage: Movement: +[0.2c/0.3c/0.35c] Heat Armor: +[30%/50%/60%] Ability Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%]
Absorb Fire Energy Cost: 0 Cooldown: 4.2s Range: 2c Health restored per fire: 7
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAIce.label: Coat of Arms: Water
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAIce.description: Passively increases stats and improves decay touch to heal the golem for 8 + 4*level and another nearby pawn for the same amount. Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%]
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAArcane.label: Coat of Arms: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoAArcane.description: Passively increases stats and improves decay touch to restore 20 + 5*level energy per hit. Ability Cooldown: -[12%/24%/36%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[15%/30%/45%]
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoADeath.label: Coat of Arms: Death
LanguageData.TM_HollowGolem_CoADeath.description: Passively increases stats and improves decay touch to be 50% more effective and strike twice. Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Ability Cooldown: -[8%/16%/24%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: +[15%/30%/45%]
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGFire.label: Protection Gem: Fire
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGFire.description:
The Fire protection gem allows the golem to encase itself in fire with the Burning Fury shield. Burning Fury provides a 35% damage reduction to all attacks, cauterizes wounds, prevents being staggered, and burns nearby enemies.
Energy Cost: 120 Cooldown: 1200s Duration: 100s
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGIce.label: Protection Gem: Water
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGIce.description: The Water protection gem allows the golem evade incoming attacks. The chance to evade an attack is proportional to the golem's energy percent. Each evasion reduces the golems energy by 5. This ability is persistent as long as the golem energy threshold is above the minimum required to use abilities.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGArcane.label: Protection Gem: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGArcane.description:
The Arcane protection gem allows the golem to surround enemy ranged attackers with a reverse shield called Well of Despair. Well of Despair allows projectiles in but will block all projectiles out.
Energy Cost: 60 Cooldown: 480 Range: 50 Duration: 20s
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGDeath.label: Protection Gem: Death
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGDeath.description:
The Death protection gem surrounds the golem with a cursed aura. Enemies within 15 cells can be stricken with a curse that degrades willpower and combat abilities. The energy cost is always 10 regardless of how many enemies are affected.
Aura Range: 15 Pulse Rate: 12s Energy Cost: 10 energy per pulse
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGDoom.label: Protection Gem: Death's Abyss
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowPGDoom.description:
The Death's Abyss protection gem curses enemies with the weight of their mortality. Enemies within 36 cells can be stricken with a movement slowing curse.
Aura Range: 36 Pulse Rate: 10s Energy Cost: 8 energy per pawn
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGFire.label: Focus Gem: Fire
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGFire.description:
The Fire focus gem allows the golem to concentrate elemental fire into a fierce burst of firebolts. Launches 16 firebolts at enemies within 8 cells of a target.
Energy Cost: 40 Min Range: 6 Max Range: 50
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGIce.label: Focus Gem: Ice
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGIce.description:
The Ice focus gem allows the golem to concentrate elemental ice into a rapid flow of icebolts. Launches 16 icebolts at enemies within 12 cells of a target.
Energy Cost: 60 Min Range: 10 Max Range: 70
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGArcane.label: Focus Gem: Arcane
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGArcane.description:
The Arcane focus gem allows the golem to concentrate dark energy a massive shadow bolt. Launches a single, explosive shadowbolt at the target. Extreme range.
Energy Cost: 50 Min Range: 10 Max Range: 150
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGDeath.label: Focus Gem: Death
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFGDeath.description:
The Death focus gem surrounds the golem with a field radiating death energy. Periodically strikes nearby enemies. Gains a bonus strike when any pawn dies within 10 cells of the golem.
Energy Cost: 20 Range: 10
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityFire.label: fire affinity
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityFire.description: The arcane energy within the hollow golem is entwined with elemental fire. Only one affinity is allowed per golem. This affinity causes the golem's eyes to glow reddish orange. Fire affinity grants the golem additional stats: Movement: +[25/40/50]% Health: +[40/60/75]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityIce.label: water affinity
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityIce.description: The arcane energy within the hollow golem is entwined with elemental water. Only one affinity is allowed per golem. This affinity causes the golem's eyes to glow light blue. Water affinity grants the golem additional stats: Movement: +[20/30/35]% Health: +[50/75/90]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityArcane.label: arcane affinity
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityArcane.descriptio: The arcane energy within the hollow golem is further enhanced. Only one affinity is allowed per golem. This affinity causes the golem's eyes to glow magenta. Arcane affinity grants the golem additional stats: Movement: +[15/25/30]% Health: +[55/85/100]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityDeath.label: death affinity
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowAffinityDeath.description: The arcane energy within the hollow golem is entwined with death magic. Only one affinity is allowed per golem. This affinity causes the golem's eyes to glow green. Death affinity grants the golem additional stats: Movement: +[10/15/20]% Health: +[65/90/110]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowOrbOfExtinguishedFlames.d: Gain points into the active research technology will increase for every pawn killed on the map. The orb can also be toggled to detect and consume any fire within 25 cells and emits a faint silver light. These effect are only active while the hollow golem is dormant.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_HollowFlamesOfDevouringApathy.d: Actively regulates temperature and destroys any filth within 25 cells. Emits a faint mystical light. These effect are only active while the hollow golem is dormant.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalMaxEnergy.label: energy storage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 100 per level. Starting max energy is 800.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalEnergyEfficiency.label: energy efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalEnergyEfficiency.descrip: Increases energy efficiency by 10% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalEnergyRate.label: energy regeneration
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 30 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalArmor.label: armor
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalArmor.description: Increases overall protection: Blunt: +[9,16,21]% Sharp: +[13,22,29]% Heat: +[8,14,18]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalPower.label: Power
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalPower.description: Enables the golem the ability to produce excess power while dormant.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalHeat.label: Heat
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalHeat.description: Enables the golem the ability to produce heat while dormant.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MaharalLifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaMaxEnergy.label: energy cell
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 500 per level. Starting max energy is 1000.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEnergyEfficiency.label: energy converter
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEnergyEfficiency.descripti: Increases energy efficiency by 10% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEnergyRate.label: electrical neuro-core
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 50 energy/hour when disconnected from a power grid. Connecting to a power grind increases the recharge rate.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaExtinguisher.label: extinguisher
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaExtinguisher.description: Adds the ability to quickly douse fires.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaBallisticPlate.label: ballistic plate
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaBallisticPlate.description: Increases armor but decreases movement for each level: Blunt: +[24,37,49]% Sharp: +[35,53,68]% Heat: +[40,60,75]% Move: -[.3c,.5c,.6c]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaAxe.label: mecha-axe
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaAxe.description: Adds a quick cutting attack, useful for cutting down unarmored masses.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaSword.label: mecha-sword
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaSword.description: Adds a powerful cutting attack, useful for breaking through defenses and severing limbs.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaHammer.label: mecha-hammer
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaHammer.description: Adds a ruthless blunt attack, more powerful than the golems fists.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaGatlingCannon.label: Gatling cannon
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaGatlingCannon.description: Fires a 12 round burst of gunfire. Cooldown: 5s Energy Cost: 40 Range: 40
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaMiningLaser.label: mining laser
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaMiningLaser.description: Allows the golem to mine designated wall segments. Energy Cost: [20,18,16,14] Laser Power: [40,50,60,70]
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaFlameCore.label: flame core
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaFlameCore.description:
Passively increases golem stats and adds an ability that burns away nearby filth. Movement: +[0.5c/0.9c/1.2c] Processing: +[10%/20%/30%] Ability Damage: +[10%/20%/30%] Energy Cost: +[10%/20%/30%]
Cleaning Protocol Cooldown: 6s Range: 2c Energy Cost: 4 per filth
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaWaterCore.label: water core
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaWaterCore.description:
Passively increases golem stats and adds an autonomous repair mechanism. Armor: +[5%/10%/15%] Ability Cooldown: -[10%/20%/30%] Healing Bonus: +[100%/200%/300%] Energy Cost: -[15%/30%/45%]
Autonomous Repair Cooldown: 3s Energy Cost: 10(D), 30(A) Heal Amount: 8
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEarthCore.label: earth core
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEarthCore.description:
Passively increases golem stats and adds an ability that provides a shield. Armor: +[10%/18%/25%] Ability Cooldown: +[5%/10%/15%] Healing Bonus: +[60%/120%/180%] Energy Cost: +[5%/10%/15%] Processing: +[15%/30%/45%]
Shield Protocol Cooldown: 10s Energy Cost: 10 Shield Amount: 120
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaLightningCore.label: lightning core
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaLightningCore.description: Passively increases golem stats and adds a reflexive coating to the golem's shell that produces an electric discharge that stuns melee attackers. Movement: +[1.2c/1.8c/2.2c] Ability Cooldown: -[15%/30%/45%] Energy Cost: +[10%/20%/30%] Processing: -[5%/10%/15%]
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaFlameShard.label: flame shard
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaWaterShard.label: water shard
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaEarthShard.label: earth shard
LanguageData.TM_Golem_MechaLightningShard.label: lightning shard
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkMaxEnergy.label: energy storage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 100 per level. Starting max energy is 300.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkEnergyEfficiency.label: energy efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkEnergyEfficiency.descriptio: Increases energy efficiency by 8% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 40%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkEnergyRate.label: energy regeneration
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 10% per level. Starting recharge rate is 20 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkSkills.label: Skill Enhancement
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkSkills.description: Increases the skill levels of wardening by 1 per skill level. Starts with a skill of 7.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_SilkLifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneMaxEnergy.label: energy storage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 120 per level. Starting max energy is 800.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneEnergyEfficiency.label: energy efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneEnergyEfficiency.descripti: Increases energy efficiency by 10% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 50%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneEnergyRate.label: energy regeneration
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 20 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneHardening.label: hardening
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneHardening.description: Increases overall protection: Blunt: +[4,8,12]% Sharp: +[11,22,33]% Heat: +[6,12,18]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneCompactor.label: Stone compactor
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneCompactor.description: Allows the golem the ability to crush stone chunks into usable bricks. This process occurs on its own after the stone chunks are deposited into the golem, and requires the golem to be in it's dormant state.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneToBricks.label: making
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneToBricks.description: Converts stone chucks into bricks over time
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StoneLifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawMaxEnergy.label: energy storage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 100 per level. Starting max energy is 300.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawEnergyEfficiency.label: energy efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawEnergyEfficiency.descripti: Increases energy efficiency by 6% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 30%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawEnergyRate.label: energy regeneration
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 20% per level. Starting recharge rate is 20 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawArmor.label: armor
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawArmor.description: Increases overall protection: Blunt: +[6,11,15]% Sharp: +[5,9,13]% Heat: +[4,7,10]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawScarecrow.label: Scarecrow
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawScarecrow.description: Wards away unwanted pests. Increases crop growth rate in a 6 cell radius.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawSeed.label: Farming
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawSeed.description: Increases the Plants skill of the golem by 2 per level. Starts with a planting skill of 0.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_StrawLifeStage.label: frame tier
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodRepair.label: restore part
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodMaxEnergy.label: energy storage
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodMaxEnergy.description: Increases maximum energy by 100 per level. Starting max energy is 400.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodEnergyEfficiency.label: energy efficiency
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodEnergyEfficiency.descriptio: Increases energy efficiency by 5% per level. Starting energy efficiency is 25%.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodEnergyRate.label: energy regeneration
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodEnergyRate.description: Increases energy charge rate by 15% per level. Starting recharge rate is 25 energy/hour.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodArmor.label: armor
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodArmor.description: Increases overall protection: Blunt: +[9,17,23]% Sharp: +[8,15,21]% Heat: +[4,7,10]%
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodSkills.label: Skill Enhancement
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodSkills.description: Increases the skill levels of construction and handling by 2 per skill level and cooking by 1 per skill level.
LanguageData.TM_Golem_WoodLifeStage.label: frame tier
